description: This file contains the implementation of the EPONHAL class, which provides various methods to interact with the EPON hardware and retrieve or modify its configuration and status. It includes functions for getting device info, link statistics, MAC tables, firmware info, and performing control operations like reset and clear statistics.

classes.name: EPONHAL
classes.description: A class providing an interface to EPON hardware functions, including retrieving device information, MAC address tables, link statistics, firmware info, and control operations.

methods.name: std::string testmodulepre_requisites()
methods.description: Returns 'SUCCESS' to indicate pre-requisites are met. Dummy implementation for registration.

methods.name: bool testmodulepost_requisites()
methods.description: Returns true as a dummy post-requisites cleanup function.

methods.name: bool initialize(IN const char * szVersion)
methods.description: Initializes the EPONHAL class, typically for registration of methods.

methods.name: void EPONHAL_GetFirmwareInfo(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Retrieves firmware information from EPON hardware and populates the response.

methods.name: void EPONHAL_GetEponChipInfo(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Retrieves EPON chip info and populates the response.

methods.name: EPON_HAL_GetManufacturerInfo
void EPONHAL_GetOnuId(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
void EPONHAL_GetMaxLogicalLinks(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
void EPONHAL_GetDeviceSysDescrInfo(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
void EPONHAL_GetOnuPacketBufferCapabilities(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
void EPONHAL_GetLlidForwardingState(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
methods.description: Retrieves LLID forwarding state for links.

methods.name: void EPONHAL_GetOamFrameRate(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
void EPONHAL_GetDynamicMacTable(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
void EPONHAL_GetOnuLinkStatistics(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)

void EPONHAL_SetClearOnuLinkStatistics(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
void EPONHAL_SetResetOnu(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
EPONHAL * CreateObject(TcpSocketServer & ptrtcpServer)
void DestroyObject(EPONHAL * stubobj)
void EPONHAL_GetManufacturerInfo(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
void EPONHAL_GetParamUlongValue(IN const Json::Value & req,OUT Json::Value & response)
bool cleanup(IN const char * szVersion)
